Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-0994 affecting package protobuf for versions less than 25.3-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-0994 affecting package protobuf for versions less than 25.3-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package protobuf is earlier than 25.3-6, affected by CVE-2026-0994
